member.name: T:RandomColorGenerator.Options
member.summary: Options for generating a random color.

member.summary: Gets or sets the color scheme to use when generating the color.

member.name: P:RandomColorGenerator.Options.Luminosity
member.summary: Gets or sets the luminosity range to use when generating the color.

member.summary: Creates a new instance using default values.

member.param: The color scheme to use when generating the color.
The luminosity range to use when generating the color.

The desired luminosity of the color.

member.param: Which color schemed to use when generating the color.
The desired luminosity of the color.

member.name: M:RandomColorGenerator.RandomColor.GetColors(RandomColorGenerator.Options[])
